page.title: 06FARMING IN GENERAL
page.content: Much of our area is woodland or farmland. There are many farms throughout the area. The main ones are Upper Ensign Farm,Stile Farm, Young Manor Farm, Gaskins,Howletts and Thorpe Farm. They vary in size from 150 to 620 acres.The main farm products are wheat,milk,hops,fruits and livestock. These products are usually transported by road, tankers take the liquid products and other lorries the rest.In spring the main jobs are sowing and stringing the hops. In the summer the main jobs are hop picking, harvesting and fruit picking. Winter is the time for ploughing and looking after the livestock.The summers here are usually warm and sunny but the winters can be cold with a lot of snow on the hills. There are about 25 to 30 farms in our area.
